it's an inn. 2 story, with no elevator. the halls can be tricky and confusing as the inn was pretty big. the room clean and quite. there is no water heater to boil water for tea or coffee, but you can get hot water from water dispenser at the hall. food was ok. for breakfast the have nasi kuning or nasi uduk, bubur ayam and bread. no butter at the time, only jams. You can order food, mostly Indonesian food from the restaurant, food varied from 30-80K rupiahs. overall it was good experience.

I like the most about this hotel is its location, in the middle of Surabaya city, but not in an area that is often get traffic jammed. But unfortunately the hotel parking lot is narrow. Well, its fit with the size of the hotel which is also not much, but its enough for business trip. The size of the room is quite right, not too small either, and clean enough. You can get the CUTE toiletries bag set (love the blue purse toiletries..he3..), and also GET FREE SNACKS (love them also...), not like mostly other budget hotels who just give free bottle water. And the last but not least, we especially LOVE THE CHEAP PRICE, but WORTH IT with all the things we could get from "The Airy Taman Remaja Kusuma Bangsa Hotel".
